item.title: Biden to travel to Peru, Brazil for likely last summits with world leaders
item.description: Biden will travel to Peru and Brazil for leader summits as he looks to define his legacy and assure allies of America's role on the world stage.

item.title: Trump 'challenging' Republican senators with controversial Cabinet picks: ANALYSIS
item.description: Donald Trump was elected with a mandate last week. He's now using it to challenge Republican senators to confirm his Cabinet picks.
